FuncDef: This command includes the calling-station-id AVP in the specified format.
CLIs: calling-station-id [ type { llid | mac | remote-id | sap-id | sap-string } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the format of the Calling-Station-ID AVP. Values-llid - The logical link identifier (LLID) is the mapping from a physical to logical identification of a subscriber line and supplied by a RADIUS llid-serv.
